title: DOJ Seizes $5M Bitcoin from SIM-Swapping Crypto Thefts
description: The U.S. Department of Justice is seizing over $5 million in bitcoin stolen through SIM-swapping attacks from October 2022 to March 2023, where hackers hijacked phone numbers to drain crypto accounts and laundered funds via an online casino. This case highlights vulnerabilities in telecom and crypto security, signaling a broader crackdown on such crimes.
